game.name: Kit's Quest
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Kit’s Quest is a challenging, fun-filled 3D platformer featuring a brave fox on a journey to rescue his sister from a menacing dragon! Explore a huge, interconnected world, collect magical dragon teeth, and learn cool abilities as Kit treks towards Skyreach Summit to save the day!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Kit’s Quest is a challenging, fun-filled 3D platformer featuring a brave fox on a journey to rescue his sister from a menacing dragon! Explore a huge, interconnected world, collect magical dragon teeth, and learn cool abilities as Kit treks towards Skyreach Summit to save the day!
